attributes.action: Investigate the practices that BA management have used to corner its Cabin Crew into  strike action
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am amazed the vilification ,wrought upon  a hard working group of people ,by the media and politicions.
There should be a inquiry into the underhand methods BA management have used which is disproportional to the savings they are seeking.
This is affecting the whole of our society ,as if this becomes the norm all working people will have very few rights left inthe work place.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
